statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.0 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_history SET status = 'Completed', transaction_date = '2021-09-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 5000.75, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_history SET status = 'pending', amount = 3500.25 WHERE user_id = 456 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE suspicious_activity SET activity_type = 'Fraudulent' WHERE activity_id = 98765;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 1500, transaction_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE suspicious_activity SET description = 'Unusual activity detected', activity_date = '2022-07-16', activity_type = 'Fraud' WHERE activity_id = 50;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 1500 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.75, date = '2023-08-15', description = 'Shopping' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.50, date = '2022-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000.00 WHERE account_name = 'Savings Account';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75, is_suspicious = false WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_id = 2002;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, is_suspicious = FALSE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 500.75 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'processed' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 50.75 WHERE account_id = 5678;
UPDATE transactions SET status = 'completed', amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fraud_activities SET date_detected = '2022-03-15', activity_description = 'Suspicious activity detected' WHERE activity_id = 54321;
